alert.note: Alert for Beadle (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 20 at 10:00AM MDT until August 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Huron. * WHEN...From this morning to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, significant amounts of rural areas will experience flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Saturday was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday evening and continue falling to 10.9 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 PM CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue James River Huron 11.0 11.0 Sat 10 AM 11.0 11.0 10.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 100 PM CDT.
